text: Hatua ya 4

SourceText: Budgeting
text: Kupanga bajeti

SourceText:
When we make a budget together, we can agree how to spend and save to prevent stress and work towards our family goals.
There are four steps in doing a family budget:
text:
Tunapopanga bajeti pamoja, tunaweza kukubaliana namna ya kutumia na kutunza kuzuia msongo wa mawazo na kufanyia kazi malengo ya familia zetu.
Kuna hatua nne za kupanga bajeti ya familia:

SourceText: Paper, pen, stones or beans
text: Karatasi, peni, mawe au maharage

SourceText:
**Think:**
1. Think about what you spend money on each month.
2. Get a piece of paper and draw pictures of all the things that you and your family spend money on each month.
3. Write next to each picture how much things cost each month (there is no need to share the number of you don’t want)
4. Add how much money you have to spend each month.
text:
**Fikiria**
1. Fikiria kila mwezi unatumia pesa kwaajili ya nini.
2. Chukua kipande cha karatasi na chora picha za vitu vyote ambavyo wewe na familia yako mnatumia pesa kwaajili ya, kila mwezi.
3. Andika kiasi cha pesa mbele ya kila picha kinachotumika kila mwezi(hakuna haja ya kushirikisha idadi ikiwa hutaki)
4. Ongeza kiasi cha pesa unachotakiwa kutumia kila mwezi.

SourceText:
**Choose:**
1. Think about your needs and wants. WANT is something you can live without while NEED is something you cannot live without.
2. Look at your list of things you spend money on and choose which are the NEEDS that you cannot live without and why? and which are WANTS, nice things but not essential and why?
3. Which are things could you try to spend less money on?
text:
**Chagua**
1. Fikiria kuhusu mahitaji yako ya lazima na yasiyo ya lazima. Mahitaji yasiyo ya lazima ni kitu flani ambacho unaweza kushi bila kukipata. wakati Mahitaji ya msingi au ya lazima ni kitu ambacho huwezi kuishi bila hicho.
2. Tazama kwenye orodha ya vitu vyako ulivyotumia pesa kwaajili ya na chagua yapi ni Mahitaji ambayo huwezi kuishi bila hayo na kwanini? na yapi ni mahitaji yasiyo ya lazima, vitu vizuri lakini sio muhimu na kwanini?
3. Ni vitu gani ambavyo unaweza kujaribu kuvitumia kwa gharama nafuu?

SourceText:
**Build:**
1. Make a budget: Write down what your income is for a month.
2. Take some stones or beans or anything write lots of bits. This is your income for the month (For example: if your income is Tsh 5000/= and you have 20 beans each bean is Tsh 2500/=
3. Decide what you will spend on what and put the stones /objects on the image
text:
**Kujenga**
1. Tengeneza bajeti: Andika kipato chako cha mwezi
2. Chukua baadhi ya mawe au maharage au kitu chochote andika vipande vingi. Hiki ni kipato chako cha mwezi (Kwa mfano: Kama kipato chako ni Shilingi za kitanzania 50,000/- na una maharage 20 kila harage ni Shilingi za kitanzania 2500/=
3. Amua utatumia pesa kwaajili ya nini na weka mawe/vitu kwenye picha

SourceText:
**Plan:**
Plan how you can save money, so you can deal with emergencies and realize your family goals. If you can save even a tiny amount for the future or emergency-it can make a big difference over time:
1. Add a circle called “emergencies”
2. Add a circle called “family goals”
3. Now try to move your money around so you can save a bit every month for each of these
text:
**Panga**
Panga jinsi unavyoweza kutunza pesa, ili uweze kushughulikia dharula na kufikia malengo ya familia yako. Kama ukiweza kutunza hata kiasi kidogo kwaajili ya siku zijazo au dharula inaweza kuleta mabadiliko makubwa baada ya muda:
1. Ongeza duara inayoitwa "dharula"
2. Ongeza duara inayoitwa: "malengo ya familia"
3. Sasa jaribu kusogeza pesa zako kuzungukia hapo ili uweze kuokoa kidogo kila mwezi kwa kila moja ya hizi

SourceText: CONGRATULATIONS! You have made your budget! Remember to do this exercise again with your other family members-If you agree on a  plan together it will make a huge difference!
text: HONGERA! Umetengeneza bajeti yako! Kumbuka kufanya zoezi hili tena na wanafamilia wengine-kama mkikubaliana na mpango pamoja italeta mabadiliko makubwa!

SourceText: Income Generating Activities
text: Shughuli za kuingiza kipato

SourceText: Many caregivers face significant financial challenges while striving to provide for their families. Acknowledging these challenges, we present practical suggestions for income-generating activities that can help alleviate financial stress and improve household stability
text: Walezi wengi hukutana na changamoto kubwa za kiuchumi huku wakijitahidi kuhudumia familia zao. Kwa kutambua changamoto hizi, tunatoa mapendekezo ya vitendo kwa shughuli za kuzalisha kipato ambazo zinaweza kusaidia kupunguza matatizo ya kiuchumi na kuboresha uimara wa kaya

SourceText: **Joining or Starting a VICOBA Group:** Join an existing Village Community Banking (VICOBA) group in your community or start your own with trusted individuals.
text: **Kujiunga au Kuanzisha Kikundi cha VICOBA:** Jiunge na kikundi kilichopo cha Benki ya Jamii ya Kijiji (VICOBA) katika jumuiya yako au anzisha chako na watu wanaoaminika.

SourceText: **Accessing Government Youth Funds:** For individuals up to 24 years old, utilize government youth funds as a start-up for group projects like poultry farming or catering, depending on what is feasible in your context.
text: **Upatikanaji wa Mitaji ya Serikali kwa Vijana:** Kwa watu binafsi hadi umri wa miaka 24, tumia fedha za vijana za serikali kama kuanzisha miradi ya vikundi kama vile ufugaji wa kuku au upishi, kulingana na kile kinachowezekana katika muktadha wako.

SourceText: **Craft Making:** Engage in soap making, batik making, and crafting accessories such as bracelets, earrings, necklaces, and handbags using locally available materials like beads or leather.
text: **Kazi za mikono:** Shiriki katika kutengeneza sabuni, kutengeneza batiki, vifaa vya urembo kama bangili, hereni, mkufu na mikoba kwa kutumia nyenzo asilia vinavyopatikana katika mazingira yetu kama vile, shanga au ngozi.

SourceText:
**Animal Husbandry and Poultry Keeping:**
Raising animals and poultry is a simple and effective way to earn income. It provides products like milk, eggs, and meat for sale or home use. With low start-up costs and regular returns, it can help you improve your household's livelihoods and food security.
text: **Ufugaji** Ufugaji wa wanyama na kuku ni njia rahisi na nzuri ya kupata kipato. Inatoa bidhaa kama maziwa, mayai na nyama kwa ajili ya kuuza na matumizi ya nyumbani. Kwa mtaji mdogo wa kuanzia na faida ya mara kwa mara, inaweza kukusaidia kuboresha maisha ya kaya yako na usalama wa chakula.

SourceText:
Take a moment to think about additional activities you can do in your community as a group or as an individual. Something that can help strengthen your household income.

REPSSI is available to provide guidance on any of these activities if you wish to implement them.
text:
Chukua muda kufikiria kuhusu shughuli za ziada ambazo unaweza kuzifanya kwenye jamii yako kama kikundi au mtu binafsi. Kitu ambacho kinaweza kusaidia kuimarisha kipato cha kaya.

REPSSI ipo kwa ajili ya kutoa muongozo, ikiwa ungependa kutekeleza shughuli yoyote.

SourceText:
Good nutrition helps build a strong immune system, keeping young children healthy and better able to fight off colds and other infections. For kids aged 4–6, aim for a balanced diet with fruits, veggies, whole grains, lean meats or beans, and dairy or fortified soy products. Try to limit sugary snacks, salty foods, and fried treats. Also, remember to keep them well hydrated, about 5 cups (1.2 L) of fluids a day, and a bit more when it’s hot.
Here are key nutrition considerations below:
text:
Lishe bora husaidia kujenga kinga imara, kufanya watoto wadogo wawe na afya bora na kuweza kupambana na homa na magonjwa mengine. Kwa watoto wenye umri wa miaka 4-6, lenga kuwapatia mlo kamili wenye matunda, mboga za majani, nafaka, nyama isiyo na mafuta mengi, maharage, au bidhaa za soya zilizoimarishwa. Jaribu kupunguza vitafunio vyenye sukari, vyakula vyenye chumvi na chips za kukaanga. wafanye wanywe maji mengi kuanzia vikombe vitano (lita 1.2) ya vimiminika kwa siku na zaidi kidogo kama kuna joto sana.
Hapa kuna vidokezo vya msingi kuhusu Lishe hapo chini:

SourceText: Fruits and Vegetables: Encourage a variety of colorful fruits and vegetables to provide essential vitamins and minerals for the child.
text: Matunda na Mboga za majani: Himiza aina za matunda yenye rangi mbalimbali na mboga za majani kutoa vitamini na madini muhimu kwa mtoto.

SourceText: Whole Grains: Choose whole grains over refined grains to provide fiber and other nutrients.
text: Nafaka: Chagua nafaka ambayo haijakobolewa ili kunufaika na nyuzinyuzi pamoja na virutubisho.

SourceText: Lean Protein: Include lean protein sources like chicken, fish, beans, and lentils to support muscle development.
text: Vyanzo vya protini: Jumuisha nyama isiyokuwa na mafuta mengi kama kuku, samaki, maharage na dengu kusaidi ukuaji wa misuli.

SourceText: Dairy or Fortified Soy Alternatives: Ensure adequate calcium intake for bone health through dairy or fortified soy alternatives.
text: Maziwa au mbadala wake soya, iliyoimarishwa: Hakikisha ulaji wa kutosha wa kasiamu kwa afya ya mifupa ambayo inapatikana kwenye maziwa na soya iliyoimarishwa.

SourceText: Hydration: Provide plenty of water throughout the day, especially during physical activity.
text: Mwili kuwa na maji ya kutosha: Kunywa maji mengi kwa siku nzima, hasa wakati wa mazoezi.

SourceText:
Additional Tips for Caregivers:

Be Patient and Persistent: It may take several attempts for children to try new foods. Continue to offer a variety of healthy options and be patient.

Consult with a Healthcare Professional: If you have any concerns about your child's nutrition or growth, consult with a pediatrician or registered dietitian. 

All food meant for children should be prepared and stored with excellent hygiene and flavor, without too much heat or spice.

All nutrients are essential, the deficiencies in vitamins and minerals can lead to various health problems. i.e impaired vision, malnutrition, infections, respiratory illnesses, impaired cognitive development. Many of these deficiencies are preventable through nutrition education and consumption of health diet.
text: Virutubisho vyote ni muhimu, upungufu wa vitamini na madini unaweza kusababisha matatizo mbalimbali ya afya. i.e uono hafifu, utapiamlo, maambukizi, magonjwa ya mfumo wa upumuaji, ukuaji wa akili hafifu. Mengi ya mapungufu haya yanaweza kuzuilika kupitia elimu ya lishe na utumiaji wa lishe bora.

SourceText: Healthy eating habits
text: Tabia za ulaji bora

SourceText: How to Encourage Healthy Eating Habits:
text: Namna ya kuchochea tabia za ulaji bora:

SourceText: Eating together as a family, enjoy foods of all the groups to help children imitate the example of older siblings and parents
text: Kula pamoja kama familia, furahia vyakula vya makundi yote ili kuwasaidia watoto kuiga mifano ya ndugu na dada wakubwa na wazazi

SourceText: Encouraging them to help select healthy colored fruits, vegetables, and healthy meats or other foods during grocery shopping
text: Watie moyo kuwasaidia kuchagua matunda, mboga mboga, na nyama zenye afya nzuri au vyakula vingine wakati wa ununuzi

SourceText: Letting them help with food preparation especially from the vegetable and pulses group
text: Kuwaruhusu wasaidie katika utayarishaji wa chakula hasa kutoka kwenye kundi la mboga mboga na kunde

SourceText: Stocking fruits rather than fruit juice and chews, and cold water rather than soda or other sweetened drinks
text: Kuhifadhi matunda badala ya Juisi na vitafunwa, na maji ya baridi badala ya soda au vinywaji vingine vyenye sukari

SourceText: Sharing interesting information about how foods are grown and how they reach the local market
text: Kushirikisha taarifa ya kuvutia kuhusu jinsi ya ulimaji wa vyakula na jinsi vinavyoweza kufika soko la ndani

SourceText:
Involve Children in Meal Preparation: Allow children to participate in age-appropriate food preparation tasks, which can help them develop a positive relationship with food.

Make Mealtimes Fun and Social: As caregiver/parent create a positive and relaxed environment for mealtimes to encourage healthy eating habits and responsive feeding.
text:
Shirikisha Watoto katika Maandalizi ya chakula: Ruhusu watoto washiriki katika kazi zinazolingana na umri wao kuandaa chakula, jambo ambalo linaweza kuwasaidia kukuza uhusiano mzuri na chakula.
Fanya Nyakati za Kula kuwa za Kufurahisha na kuchangamana: Kama mlezi/mzazi tengeneza mazingira mazuri na tulivu kwa nyakati za chakula ili kuhimiza tabia ya ulaji unaofaa na ulishaji mzuri.

text: Jenga
